name: Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus 5G 128GB
title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus 5G 128GB
description: Samsung Galaxy S22 Plus 5G 128GB (BHDT) has a modern, high-end design with a 6.6-inch wide screen, and Dynamic AMOLED 2X, 120Hz screen technology. The device is equipped with powerful performance with Snapdragon 8 Gen 1, Android 12 operating system with One UI 4.0 interface. At the same time, the 50MP camera is also a special highlight on the device.
